explanation: Creates new pin within area. Requires area_id.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate in terms of percentage. Data format is float, and ranges between 0 -> 1.0.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate in terms of percentage. Data format is float, and ranges between 0 -> 1.0.

parameters.name: area_id
parameters.description: ID of the area which the pin belongs to

response_fields.name: x
response_fields.description: X coordinate in terms of percentage. Data format is float, and ranges between 0 -> 1.0.

response_fields.name: y
response_fields.description: Y coordinate in terms of percentage. Data format is float, and ranges between 0 -> 1.0.

response_fields.name: area_id
response_fields.description: ID of the area which the pin belongs to

requests.curl:
curl "http://jobwalk-staging.herokuapp.com/api/v1/pins/" -d '{"pin":{"x":0.75,"y":0.25,"description":"New pin description.","area_id":1}}' -X POST \
	-H "Accept: application/json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json"
